content.title: NFI Using Third-Party Library
content.body:
Let’s get started!

In this hike, we will:

  1. Learn how to import a Collection library to an app and use it in a form.
  2. Configure the Native Function APIs required for barcode scanner for an Android app.
  3. Add code in the Form controller for the barcode scanning functionality.
  4. Build, Publish, and View the app.

Before you begin:

  • From the Google Play store, download the Barcode Scanner
  • Download the UI collection: flxBarcodeScanner.

When you are ready, click Next!
